page.description: The .CREATE() method creates and displays the {WAITDIALOG} dialog box with progress bar.
page.syntax: Create as P([ message_lines as N[, style as C]])

argument.name: message_lines
argument.description: The number of lines to allow below the progress bar for text messages, maximum of 3.

item.name: "Percent" - a standard progress bar display that shows the degree of completion
"Repeating" = the progress bar builds from the left, disappears, and then builds again
"Bounce" = the progress bar shuttles left to right, then right to left, and repeats continuously
